name: European Coalition for Israel
goal: ECI seeks to address the issue of growing anti-Semitism and anti-Zionism in Europe and inform members of European Parliament and other political leaders in Brussels and other European capitals about the complex realities of the conflict in the Middle East by acknowledging the right for Israel to exist within secure borders.
interests: Budget, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trade
euInitiatives: ECI is following all EU policies related to the Middle East, in particular policies related to the disputed territories. ECI also has a genuine interest in any initiatives and policies connected with the rise of anti-Semitism and xenophobia in Europe.
